original_text: Two and twenty years old was Ahaziah when he began to reign; and he reigned one year in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Athaliah, the daughter of Omri king of Israel.
korean_text: 아하시야가 왕이 될 때에 나이가 이십이 세라 예루살렘에서 일 년을 통치하니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 아달랴라 이스라엘 왕 오므리의 손녀이더라

sentences.original_text: Two and twenty years old was Ahaziah
and he reigned one year in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 예루살렘에서 일 년간 통치했다

sentences.original_text: And his mother's name was Athaliah
the daughter of Omri king of Israel
